categories.name: PEEKING
categories.description: Observing items and signals as they pass through the stream

categories.name: FILTERING
categories.description: Operators that remove items from a stream based on some criteria

categories.name: SLICING
categories.description: Cutting the stream into sequential segments

categories.name: TRANSFORMATION
categories.description: Operators that change the form of items and signals passing through the stream

categories.name: MERGING
categories.description: Combining multiple streams into a single stream

categories.name: ACCUMULATING
categories.description: Accumulate items and signals and emit events based on accumulation process

categories.name: UNKNOWN
categories.description: Unknown how we should categorize this operator at this stage
